remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113, 2nd paragraph on p. 114. ` D ` represents s_2.  In their notation, we prove s ` \/ ` s_2 = s ` \/ ` r.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2012.)
statement:
cdleme10.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme10.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme10.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme10.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme10.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme10.d $e |- D = ( ( R .\/ S ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme10 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ R e. A /\ ( S e. A /\ -. S .<_ W ) ) -> ( S .\/ D ) = ( S .\/ R ) ) $.
